name: Dark Ascent
description:
Dark Ascent is a top down dungeon crawler where you need to ascend though each floor of the dungeon to escape back to the light of day.

Journey through  3 floors in your quest to escape, you must find a key on each floor to reach the stairs. However you are not alone, monsters guard every turn, some may look friendly, but none have good intentions!

Dark Ascent is a windows only, keyboard and mouse controlled, suitable for all ages. 

This project is to be considered as an early access title.
